original_title: Aziz Ansari: Intimate Moments for a Sensual Evening
overview: Aziz Ansari presents his highly anticipated debut hour long stand-up special. The critically acclaimed stand-up and actor (Parks and Recreation, Funny People) discusses topics ranging from sheets with fraudulent thread counts to the chubbiness of his young cousin Harris. Also included is a special encore performance from Raaaaaaaandy.
title: Aziz Ansari: Intimate Moments for a Sensual Evening
